mapper.select: SELECT ID, TBOILER_ID, NO, FUNCTION_DEC, FUNCTIO, version, MODEL_DEC, MODEL, TONS, FUELTYPE_DEC, FUELTYPE, COALASH, COALSULFUR, COMBUSTIONSYSTEM, FUEL_AUSAGE, FUEL_AUSAGEUNIT, EXHUST_ID, b.EXF_NO, b.NK_NO, dustremove_dec, dustremove_id, sulphurremove_dec, sulphurremove_id, nitreremove_dec, nitreremove_id, factor_pm10, pm10, factor_co, factor_pm25, pm25, factor_voc, co, voc, factor_pm, pm, factor_so2, so2, factor_nox, nox, factor_nh3, nh3, factor_oc, oc, factor_status, factor_bc, bc, scc, machine_no, coal_volatilisation, installed_capacity, feiqiti, so2out, noxout, pmout, Jan_useamount, Feb_useamount, Mar_useamount, Apr_useamount, May_useamount, June_useamount, July_useamount, aug_useamount, sept_useamount, oct_use_amount, nov_useamount, dec_useamount from boiler b join exhaust e on b.EXHUST_ID = e.EXF_ID WHERE FACTORY_ID = #{factoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
